prompt:
Create a to-do list of tasks to learn data science from beginner to advanced. Here are some resources:
- [Introduction to Data Science](https://www.coursera.org/learn/what-is-datascience)
- [Intermediate Data Science](https://www.edx.org/professional-certificate/data-science)
- [Advanced Data Science](https://www.udacity.com/course/data-scientist-nanodegree--nd025)

details: Understand the basics of data science and its importance
Learn about different types of data and data sources
Explore basic data science tools and techniques
Learn Python basics and essential libraries for data science
Understand data manipulation with Pandas
Practice data visualization with Matplotlib and Seaborn
Learn basic statistical concepts and their applications in data science
Understand probability, distributions, and hypothesis testing
Practice descriptive and inferential statistics
Learn techniques for exploring and analyzing data
Understand data cleaning and preprocessing
Practice with real-world datasets
Understand the principles of machine learning
Learn about supervised and unsupervised learning
Implement basic algorithms like linear regression and k-means clustering
Learn techniques for evaluating and validating models
Understand cross-validation and model selection
Practice with metrics like accuracy, precision, and recall
Understand the basics of neural networks and deep learning
Learn about architectures like CNNs and RNNs
Implement deep learning models using TensorFlow or PyTorch
Learn techniques for processing and analyzing text data
Understand concepts like tokenization, stemming, and lemmatization
Implement NLP models for tasks like sentiment analysis and text classification
Understand the basics of big data and its challenges
Learn about tools like Hadoop and Spark
Implement big data solutions for large-scale data processing

Implement data storage solutions in your apps
Learn about RESTful APIs and HTTP requests
Understand how to use URLSession and Alamofire
Implement networking features in your apps
Understand the basics of cross-platform development
Learn about frameworks like Flutter and React Native
Build a simple cross-platform application
Learn about advanced UI/UX principles
Understand animations and custom views
Implement complex and engaging user interfaces
Learn techniques for optimizing app performance
Understand memory management and battery efficiency
Implement performance improvements in your applications

Understand the principles of ethical hacking and penetration testing

Practice with tools like Metasploit and Burp Suite
Learn techniques for proactive threat hunting

Understand how to design secure systems and networks
Implement security architecture best practices

Understand the basics of reinforcement learning
